item.title: RNA-Seq analysis
item.description: library(reticulate) # py_install("pandas") # py_install("numpy") # py_install("matplotlib") # py_install("seaborn") # py_install("random") # py_install("sklearn",pip = TRUE) # import modules import pandas as pd import seaborn as sns import random import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np from sklearn.decomposition import PCA from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler from sklearn.cluster import KMeans What is gene expression matrix? Analysis of gene expression matrix data source: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE149146 This expression matrix has been normalized by limma package.
